values:
Here is my plan:
Finish my 3rd year in bizness. (Get my Bachelor of something something...)
Attend the USA for my 4th year and go to Teachers College.
Play Baseball at a D1 Level - while doing Teachers College.

Makes Sense ?

What I ask of you nice American People... What are some good teachers college? Anyone got some inside INFO for me?!?

Let me Know, cuz thats how I roll.

Later BoyznGirlz.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/5936.html

Haven't posted in awhile.... 

My spring break/reading week as we like to call it up here in the Great White North was spectacular. Lots of drinking, lots of fun... and shit like that.

I won't go into details, but it was all good shit.

Keep me in the loop people. Send me some love.

1Luv
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/5726.html

I'm writing a novel.

"Hilarity: Liquor, Beer and The Night with the Queer."

1LUV.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/5467.html

WoW... What to say... What to write... 

Last night ---> So I said to myself, "Wils" you deserve a drink. Little did he know that 'a drink' consisted of about 12 rum and fruitpunches (yah i had no coke..so i had to try something new...) And that 12 quickly turned him into the state of 'buzzed'...

Ending up going out - Got a Hot-Dog, came home, BUT NOT BEFORE I SAW A GIRL GET KNOCKED OUT BY THE 5-0!

Tomorrow Guelph.

I'm out like that broad last night.

Addition: 
"This ain't no temporary, typical, tearful good-bye, uh uh uh
This ain't no breakin' up and wakin' up and makin' up one more time, uh uh uh
This is gone (gone) gone (gone) gone (gone) gone

Gone like a freight-train, gone like yesterday
Gone like a soldier in the civil war, bang bang
Gone like a '59 Cadillac
Like all the good things that ain't never coming back
She's gone (gone) gone (gone) gone (gone) gone, she's gone." 
      - great song! live it, love it! - Have fun, don't get too up tight, thats when you'll fight...Do that shit up the good way!

Peace.
1LUV
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/5184.html

First of all, I would like to apologize to my Hoes and Bros in Michigan. "Wils' Shitshow Spectacle" is cancelled.

The New plan of action:

Thursday: Baseball Boyz Birthdays... Shitshow #1 @ Campus bar. Off da Hook.

Friday 3:00 pm - Arrive in Guelph and start drinking. No time to waste.
Friday Night - Off to the bar with my friends. Oh yes. Shitshow #2 is in full action.

Saturday: Benny Mah returns from School. Shitshow # 3 is possible. Undecided plan of action yet.

Sunday & Monday - Studying

Tuesday - Possible trip to Oakville to visit some people, and my future wife.

Wednesday - Yes Big Beer Night at Trappers. Shitshow #4

Thursday - The Ranch? Country Bar... No shitshow - It's a country bar!

Weekend - Shitshow Festival - last weekend in the G before end of Semester. I will be totally out of control as will my friends. I promise a goodtime. Stories galore. I'll update with them.

Sunday - Back to St. Catharines.

***Plan Subject to change***

1LUV
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/5104.html

Less than 4 days till Guelph. Little quote I pulled up for the weekend Boyz and Girlz...

"I've learned one thing, and that's to quit worrying about stupid things.  You have four years to be irresponsible here. RELAX!  Work is for people who have jobs, you'll never remember class time, but you'll remember time you wasted hanging out with your friends.  So, stay out late, go out on a Tuesday when you have a paper due on Wednesday.  Spend money you don't have.   Drink till sunrise.  The work never ends, but college does!"

Represent it Ladies and Gents.

1LUV.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/4813.html

4 Days - thats what you've got.... 4 Days till Wils head to Guelph.

Wouldn't life be perfect if sweatpants were sexy, Monday mornings were fun, junk food didn't make you fat, girls didn't cause drama, boys like me weren't so perfect, nothing was regrettable, and goodbyes only meant until tomorrow?

Pick it up, throw it down - suck it up, no time to frown. 
1LUV

Good Day Ladies and Gentlemen.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/4506.html

I have summed up my life...

I drink... drink more... drink even more. Get totally hammered. Wait for my friends to show up... drink more... Do many stupid things, the next day claim they were funny. Repeat process for entire weekend. It's a clyical process.

I need stability.

...and I need it fast.

5 days till the process begins again. 

1LUV
p.s. - I've come to the conclusion that I must meet the girl of my dreams in the next two weeks.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/4217.html

7 days...less than 7 days...

Is Guelph ready for their child prodigy, their prototypical son - to finally come home?
 ---- Listen Biatches, I will be home at approxiamtely 3:00 pm. I want some beer waiting for me, chilled, so we can get absolutely plastered for a few days. Then after those few days, I will move my affectionally named 'shitshow' to Michigan. Yes, after a few months off, they will again be saying "detroit rock city..." 

Lets get it done right - So Let a Canadian do it for you.

1LUV.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/3860.html

"Remember when old ones died and new were born
And life was changed, disassembled, rearranged
We came together, fell apart
And broke each other's hearts
Remember when"

Time for reflection:

- always dreamt that I would become a professional baseball player
- If baseball failed, a bigtime Business guru
- a girlfriend that was accomodating to my needs and wants
- If business failed, an artist or a song writer

Looking back on my life thus far,
I got to the point in baseball, where I knew I could go no further. As one New York Mets scout once told me, "You have a tremendous amount of talent, but thousands of other players have that much talent as well." I decided that after one season of playing college baseball, enough was enough.

I'm at the point in my life, where I need to make a decision, do I go into Business as I'm currently studying towards - or do I share my artistic talents with the world?

I have been offered entry level modelling contracts with various different companies, but do I really want to get into that shit? I was thinking about putting a display together of my various drawings... but do I want to do that? Not sure.

We won't even touch the girlfriend aspect. :)

Decisions, decisions... I thought I would bore you all with these details.

1LUV,
Later Haters.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/3673.html

It is what it is. I am what I am. Take it or leave it. 

I am that guy, that guy that looks good in denim or khacki's. I am that guy, that guy that looks stunning in collered shirts or Hooddies. I am that guy, that guy who has a knack for words with a pen. I am that guy, that guy who will take a bullet if and when. Who knows what the future will bring, all I know is that reality slightly stings.

1LUV,
Later Haters.
P.S. - Can someone tell me how to post pictures?
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/3430.html

"There's something about that way you look tonight. 
There's something about the way that I can't take my eyes off you
There's something about the way your lips look tonight
Maybe it's the way that i get nervous when you're around, and I want you to be mine, 
And if you need a reason why
It's in the way, that you move me, the way that you tease me, 
The way that i want you tonight, it's in the way that you hold me, 
And the way that you know me, And when i cant find the right words to say, 
You feel it in the way... 
I can't put my fingers on it, just what it is that makes me, love you...baby,
So dont ask me to describe, cuz I get all choked up inside,
just thinking about the way."

I think this is a make or break type kind of week.

- I can either make it big with my Calculus test or break it with a failure.
- Possibility of getting back together with my ex-girlfriend.
- Case assignment for Management class.

"I used to wonder why the songs on the radio, always seemed to be about love, if you look, every book, every tv show is about that stuff..."

"It ain't cool to sing about love songs, but I'm singing one to you..."

I'm losing my voice, but is that all that I'm losing? No. I lost my heart a week and a half ago, I lost my integrity on Friday, and I lost focus through it all.

If any of you know me, when things aren't going right in Baseball, I lift up my pants, and go high socks... It's about that time of the year, to go high socks... Cuz it's make or break!

Later Bro's and Hoes.
1LUV.
Pick it up, throw it down - suck it up, no time to frown.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/3107.html

Back the truck up Bitch... Unhook ur trailer Hitch... You ain't nothing but a trailer park witch...

Can't Catch me, I'm 2 fast, 2 furious... Cashin Pink slips, the whole enchalta, you just know you gotta.

February 1st, Rent Day. Damn - gotta find $400 quick.... I think you know how I roll.

Big Calculus Test on Friday - I hate you calculus!

Doing absolutely nothing today. Has anyone ever heard of the band Lonestar? Well I'm writing a song for them.... Who's got da Hookup now Biatches...

I'm out to buy some bread.

1LUV.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/2997.html

Friday Night - Lets just say someone called it a "shit show" - I agree.


I was so drunk, I tried to get money out of the ATM - but I put my bank card in the 'receipts' section of it... and lost my card... luckily two cute girls got it out, when they got money out - the card slid out, with their receipt! "I'll take that ladies, thanks!"

Picked up a girl with a 'summer' teeth. Some are here, some are there... Thanks to my boyz for telling me, she's missing teeth! 

Wils felt like a celebrity, he posed for many pictures with the random girls... Am I hot enough to get pictures taken with? I didn't think so... but apparantly I am.

A solid weekend no doubt, Wils will be in Michigan, the weekend of the 11th... Let me bring your dull life some fun! 

Till then... 'I saw my reflection in a puddle; it was ruined with a single tear..."

1Luv.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/2814.html

I'm in a great fucking mood. I don't know why... but I am. Possibly cuz I get to come home to Guelph. I will be making the voyage home tomorrow around 1pm. So fuckas, I pose the question are you ready?

By the way, I will be making an appearance in Michigan from Feb 11th-13th or so... I pose the question to you American Fuckas, "Are you Ready?"

Wils is out.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/2491.html

Going Back to my roots Friday... Gotta Represent the G in the way we all know - Hardcore Partying...

It's been 23 days since my last visit to the G, Whoa, the time just flies by...

Expectations for this weekend:

- "I think, therefore I Drink..." - Drunken Friday Nights at the Trap (Trappers Bar...)
- "I love this bar" - Drunken Saturdays @ The Ranch... Country Bar - Good Times? Dig it? Dug.
- Party with my Bra's and My Sas' 
- Wilferg Reunited
- Beatboxin - okay not really.

Can you Dig it?

1LUV
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/2277.html

The Worst part about breaking up with your girlfriend is that they always want to remain friends.... How could one possibly want to be friends after getting their heart broken?! Must be a crazy Canadian thing.... Oh well shit happens, I'm over it... Are you?

Fuck what I said it dont mean shit now
Fuck the presents might as well throw em out
Fuck all those kisses, they didn't mean jack
Fuck you you ho, I dont want you back...
 --- the lyrics of "fuck it"


Pchizzle for Now.

I'm going to make it big, in the game of rap.

Andrew.

Bitches they come, they go, Saturday through Sunday, Monday... Monday through Sunday Yo....


Story of my life.

1luv

Well Well Well... Haven't updated in awhile....

I have been super busy with school.... definently isn't the best thing to occupy your time... Anyway, Heading over to Ash's Tonight for another fabulous time I bet! It always is ... anyway, have a good weekend everyone. Peace out.

Andy.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/904.html

Well Hello again Mr. Journal - I still feel like such a girl writing in this - but some things never change.... 

What to say, where to begin ... 

Today was a semi-productive day ... It started out with me going to my Economics Tutorial, and failing my quiz miserably... followed by me going to my teacher's office and getting a second attempt at it... Go Wils.... Wils sits down at the teacher's office, she hands Wils the Quiz .... A blank stare comes over Wils' face .... hmmmmmmm ..... Then all of a sudden the idea hits him... Just guess! Brilliant Idea... Well I guess sometimes you gotta do what you gotta do... 100% later - Wils leaves her office thinking he is the smartest man alive all the while he is missing his girlfriend Ashley Tremendously.

1:14 pm - Wils arrives to write his Earth Science Midterm - WHOA! Wils should have stayed home..... 55 Multiple Choice Questions .... Wils answers the 12 that he knows ... This is where it gets interesting.... He decides that guessing is only option, Hey it worked the first time for him... so why not now?! Poor Wils... The results of the Test are not known.... but it doesn't take a genious (Like Wils thought he was...) to figure out the expected results! Where's my Ash so I can complain to her, and she can brighten my day - the only person I have met that can do such a thing!

6:00 - 9:30 pm - Wils slaves over his math Course. Stupid Group Projects. Three and a half hours later - Project is done and handed in. Next stop: House, where he can cram for his economics Midterm.

Wils the self-proclaimed Genious, figures that all he needs on his midterm is 65% and then, he can get 100% in his tutorial, 90 % on his projects and 70% on his final... and still manage an overall mark of 74 in the course! Genious I tell you! --> We'll see how this exam goes tomorrow! I need ASH here pronto to help heal my wounds! Miss you Babe! Love you.

- Time for Bed I dare say .... eagerly awaiting that phone call from that special Girl!

Take Care, and may I remind you... Genious' are not self-made, they are discovered.

Wils.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/567.html

What to say... What to say... This is my first journal entry.... I feel like such a girl writing in one of these dealio's. 

So Let's See... November 10th, 2004 - School is really starting to stress this guy out - Going to Brock University is quite a change from Macomb College. You can't really not do work and still come out with A's and B's... Lots of Work! - It must be done.

Well onto the girlfriend front. I have been dating the best girl for almost 6 months now - it has been a fabulous time. She's the best thing that has ever happened to me and makes me feel like the luckiest guy alive. Love you Ash.
http://andrewwils.livejournal.com/476.html
